title: [Beauty] How to apply 2NE1 Sandara Park’s makeup in ‘Gotta Be You’  M/V
text: Most Popular G-Dragon booked for drug use South Korea, Qatar agree to elevate ties, forge $4.6b industry partnership Former Olympic hero battles rumors surrounding her groom-to-be S. Korea goes all out to contain lumpy skin disease Yoon pitches S. Korea's investment appeal to Middle East Yoon meets Park, honors father in gesture of conservative unity 4-meter deep sinkhole injures 1 in central Seoul Olympic medalist ‘tricked’ by fiance-turned-stalker [News Focus] A year after Halloween crowd crush, legislation remains stalled Braving wind and high water to celebrate Dokdo Day Start your day with a roundup of key stories from The Korea Herald with news and comment on all that’s happening in Korea. Published : Sept. 22, 2014 - 15:28 Link copied Use a bright colored brown shadow or shading powder for the “shaded eye.” Apply it like above. Choose a yellow shadow and apply it all over the lid. Then use a glittering gold shadow and use fingertips to apply it like in the picture above. Articles by Korea Herald  The Korea Herald by Herald CorporationCopyright Herald Corporation.
